land_texture.name: Use natural land texture
land_texture.description: Whether to use a natural land texture for the globe or not

show_countries.name: Show countries and country names
show_countries.description: If enabled, will show countries and their names with a hover tooltip on the globe for the learner

show_lines.name: Show latitude and longitude lines
show_lines.description: If enabled, will show latitude and longitude lines on the globe for the learner
